page.title: 01 Life Styles From Radcot
page.content:
This is a predominately rural area.The largest farm is interesting historically,whilst the bridge is the first under which the Thames flows in Oxfordshire.A public house by the bridge is the main source of light refreshment both for river traffic and motorised travellers. There are the expected modern amenities such as electricity,a postal service and recreation area.
The town of Faringdon is nearby with the villages of Clanfield,Littleworth and Bampton all within a short distance.
